direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Freeze and Chun Woo flatten themselves on either side of the door as Burglar #4 drops to one knee and quickly picks the lock. Suddenly the glass doors EXPLODE wide open as a HUMAN WHIRLWIND bursts out of the bank, shoots right past them and zig-zags up THE street. Twenty dollar bills slowly drift down onto the stunned robbers in its wake. In an instant the whirlwind does a U-turn, zig-zag races back up to them and SCREECHES to a halt. The Mask, still in his banana yellow zoot suit and carrying huge sacks of money like Santa Claus, plucks those stray twenties from the air, one, two, three.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sorry, fellas. Waste not want not! And ZZZOOM, he's off again. HOOTING laughter like a maniac. Freeze pulls his gun.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . FREEZE Get that sucker! Two cop cars now SQUEAL around the corner, their sirens blaring and ROAR up the street at the bank robbers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . FREEZE Oh, shit! The robbers race back to the van, dive inside and PEEL OUT. The police open fire as they roar after them in hot pursuit. Bullets tear into the van, blowing out the rear windows.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The die-hard crowd of TRENDIES is piled up outside as usual clamoring to get in. But a buzz of excitement begins to travel through the crowd as one by one they notice...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But not just any limousine. As it slowly pulls up by the front of the club we realized it's long... longer... the longest limousine we'vve ever seen. Finally the passenger door rolls into sight and the limo comes to a halt. The door bursts open and out leaps the Mask.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah... my public! The crowd parts like the Red Sea as the Mask sashays to the front door. Bobby the Bouncer gets one look at the Mask and actually loses his cool.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Er, uh... Are you on the list?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, but I believe my friends are. (fans a wad of cash) Jackson, Lincoln and Roosevelt. He tosses a handful of loot in the air and struts into the club as the crowd scrambles for the cash.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is the first time we've gotten a good look at the place and it's a real eyeful. CAMERA BOOMS DOWN TO REVEAL its wild tropical DECOR complete with live exotic birds in huge indoor Banyon trees. WAITRESSES in leopard skin leotards make their way across the crowded dance floor with trays full of oversized tropical drinks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: as the hostess seats Dorian at his favorite ringside table and removes the "reserved" sign. The lights dim an all eyes go to the bandstand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A spotlight hits the stage and tropical ferns part like a gigantic fan revealing...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: in a glittering gown that's made of little more than sequins and mesh. If there were such a thing as fashion police this dress would be arrested for disturbing the peace. She talks/sings the intro of her number a capella.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There's all kinds of men In this old world That seek the affections Of a beautiful girl. But of the men from Which to choose There's only one type That I... ap...aprooove. And now the band slides in, in classic torch song style as Tina sings "Checks Appeal". She works the room throughout the song, driving the men crazy as she lingers by each table.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (CONT.) You can keep your cowboys on the farm The gigolos don't make me warm It's mink my fingers crave to feel I need a man with checks appeal.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Mask is seated at a table on the other side of the club and immediately reacts when he lays eyes on Tina. His eyes BUG OUT on stalks, an AHOOGA horn sounds and his heart starts POUNDING wildly, shooting two feet out of his chest with EACH beat. Customers at nearby tables are astonished.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (CONT.) Pretty boys are such a bore There's manly macho types galore But you'll always know The diamond's real If you've got a man with checks appeal. The Mask snatches a bottle off a passing WAITRESS' tray and sucks it down in one gulp. His head VIBRATES like an electric paint shaker. WWWOOOING! He CLAPS both hands on his head to hold it still.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sweet Eddy looks nervous as hell as he appears beside Dorian.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What the hell are you doing here?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We got trouble. You better come upstairs. Dorian immediately rises and hurries through the corwd towards his office.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: as he continues to ogle Tina. His face now elongates into a wolf's. He HOWLS, WHISTLES, pounds his fist on the table and stomps his foot on the floor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't want to see too fanatic But dollar signs are so romantic I want a love That's deep and real Just with a man that's got... (big finish) Checks ap-peaaal. The audience goes crazy. Tina takes a bow. Suddenly the Mask ZZZIPS around the perimiter of the club, leaps up on top of the piano and SNAPS his fingers. A spotlight hits him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's rock this joint! He grabs the stuffy, tuxedoed PIANIST'S stool and spins it hard. When the pianist stops twirling, he been transformed into a hip, BEATNIK BE-BOPPER who immediately starts pounding out a mean BOOGIE- WOOGIE. The Mask produces a conductor's baton from thin air, spins around and magically whips the rest of the band into a frenzy, WAILING out a driving rock 'n roll tune. Satisfied with the music, the Mask leaps down onto the dance floor, grabs the astonished Tina and drags her off her feet into a wild special FX JITTERBUG.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: watches amazed as...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: put Fred and Ginger to shame. Jiving away at warp speed, the Mask movves like a combination of Gumby and Barishnikov. He SHOOTS TINA beneath his legs, SNAPS her back into midair, SPINS her like a baton and hits the floor in the splits without missing a beat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: S-s-s-smokin!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dorian and Sweet Eddy enter to find Dr. Freeze, sitting there, gasping in pain with a bar towel pressed against a bloody wound in his side.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What the hell happened to you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll be okay. Nobody puts the chill on Freeze.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where's the money?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Deal went south, Bro'. Someone else hit the place before we did.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't know. Dude looked like a freakin' goblin or something. Next thing we know there's cops all over us, man.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where's Chun Woo?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Takin' a dirt nap. It was bad, man. Real bad. (swallows hard) I need a smoke.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah... sure. Dorian taps out a cigarette, places it between Dr. Freeze's lips and lights it... but the flame doesn't draw. Beat. The cigarette tumbles from Freeze's mouth. Dorian glances back up and sees that Dr. Freeze's eyes are glazed over in death. Dorian leaps to his feat and hurls his chair across the room in anger. It SMASHES the mirror over his bar.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (CONT.) Son of a bitch! Who did this Eddy? Who? Eddy is staring at Dorian's T.V. monitor. On it the Mask can still be seen in the midst of his wild dance with Tina.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's him... That's the guy! Dorian grabs a .45 from his desk, checks the barrel and jams it in his coat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Mask spins Tina all around him like a top and then SHOOTS her straight up into the air. Amazingly, she continues somersaulting at the apex of her ascent, suspended in mid-air by her magical momentum.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: stands there nonchalantly filing his nails, whistling to himself. Tina continues to SPIN in place high above him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: casually checks his watch. Without looking up he holds out one hand for the catch.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: perfect timing... A final somesault and she drops right back down into his arms. They go straight back into a rockin' hitterbug without missing a beat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dorian and Eddy race down the steps, guns drawn. Dorian calls to Bobby by the hostess' stand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Clear the club. Now!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The dance's grand finale. The Mask spins Tina around and around his body like a baton in one of those awful Hawaiian fire dances. As the band bangs out the final bars of the tune, the Mask SCREECHES Tina to a halt, bends her over backwards and nails her with a Valentino kiss that literally blows her shoes off; SSSMACK! KAPOW! She hangs onto the Mask's tie for support when BANG the tie is shot in half. Tina falls on her cute behind. C.U. - TIE The shot-away piece of the Mask's tie flutters to the floor and MORPHS back into a piece of Stanley's pajamas.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: stands at the edge of the dance floor, his smoking gun trained on the Mask.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (gasps in mock horror) Gee willickers! Does this mean we won't make the Star Search finals?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This means you won't make it out of this club alive if you don't tell me where my money is.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay... The Mask immediately whips out an old fashioned pull handle calculator, snaps on a green visor and starts tabulating. KA- CHING.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (CONT.) (fast talking) You got a 27.5% in T-Bills amortized over the fiscal yeah
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: % in stocks and bonds/ (KA-CHING, KA-CHING) Carry the nine and divide by the Gross National Product...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now cut that out! (turns to Eddy) Ventilate this goon! Eddy pulls out his .38 and starts blasting BLAM. BLAM. The Mask dodges the bullets by contorting his cartoon-flexible body.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . The Mask SPINS once and freezes in a pirouette, now dressed in a tutu.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . The Mask SPINS again and stops dressed as a matador, the bullet whizzes under his cape.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A hockey goalie bats the bullet away. A Russian Dancer leaps over the shot. A Cowboy DING! takes the hit. The Mask staggers back... the forwards in a classic Western death scene. He throws an arm around Sweet Eddy for support.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ak... you got me Pahdnuh. (cough... cough) Eddy seems touched by the Mask's dying words as he holds him in his arms.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (CONT.) Hold me close, Red. It's a gettin' dark. (COUGH) Tell Auntie Em to let Old Yeller out. (cough... cough) Tell Tint Tim I won't be makin' it home for Christmas. (COUGH) Tell Scarlet I do give a damn... I... I... UUG! And the Mask gives up the ghost, his pink tongue flops out the side of his mouth. Eddy bursts into tears. Suddenly a huge cartoon AUDIENCE pops up silhouetted in the foreground, applauding wildly. An off-camera ARM shoots into frame handing the Mask an Oscar. The Mask leaps to his feet and starts taking bows.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (CONT.) Thank you! You love me! You really love me! Dorian pulls out his own .45 and opens fire. The Mask starts HOOTING laughter and ricochets off the dance floor. Dorian gives chase, but suddenly the nightclub doors are KICKED OPEN and Kellaway and a squad of police burst into the room with THEIR guns drawn.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Drop it, Tyrel! Dorian lets his .45 CLATTER to the ground. Kellaway retrieves it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hello, Kellaway. You got a warrant or did you just drop by for a night cap?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I got probable cause. A couple of your boys were spotted knocking over Edge City Bank. One of his men begins to roughly frisk Dorian
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Easy, junior. You're givin' me a woodey.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: One of them was wearin' some kind of big green mask.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: For once you're on the right track, but that's not one of my men. Maybe you ought to try a little actual police work instead of this harassment bullshit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This isn't harassment. You want to see some harassment? (to his men) Search the place, boys. His men begin to tear the club apart.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ever wonder why you didn't make Captain, asshole? I got friends so high up they'd give you a nose bleed. Kellaway hauls off and CRACKS him in the face with a solid right cross.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well what d'ya know? I guess they gave you one too. Dorian shakes it off and glares at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're a dead man. One of the officers now appears on the stairway.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lt., we got a stiff upstairs. One of the guys from the heist.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (cuffs him) Better call that high-priced lawyer of yours, Tyrel. You're comin' downtown.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll be back on the streets before sunrise and you know it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then just think of this as the city's way of showing you a little hospitality. (pats him on the cheek) I'll stop by to tuck you in myself. As the police drag Dorian outside, Kellaway notices someting on the dance floor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: R Kellaway picks up the slice of pajama fabric that was once the Mask's tie and inspects it closely... It's the same fabric Kellaway saw Stalney wearing that morning.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kellaway exits and walks right past the poster of Tina. Flattened into the poster, with his arm around her, is a cartoon of the Mask. The eyes follow Kellaway as he speaks to TWO COPS guarding the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're on your own, boys.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't worry, Lt. If he's in there, well get him. Kellaway slips the pajamas fabric in his pocket.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And if he's not, I got a feeling I know where to find him. As Kellaway heads for his car, the Mask slips out of the poster (still flat as a pancake), slides along the wall behind unsuspecting policemen and around the corner to safety.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Milo GROWLS, Frisbee in mouth. Stanley wakes up with a massive headache and dark rings under his eyes. The Mask, which lies on the pillow next to him is taking a greater and greater toll. There's a BANGING on the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . KELLAWAY (O.S.) Police. Open up. Stanley runs to the closet to hide the Mask. The instant he opens the door, an avalanche of CASH pours out, suffocating him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh my god!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . KELLAWAY (O.S.) Ipkiss! I know you're in there. Stanley grabs the Frisbee and starts shoveling the money back into the closet. Now the doorbell starts RINGING.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All right, I'm coming! Stanley tosses the Mask and the Frisbee into the closet and SLAMS it shut. He scoops up a few stray dollars and throws them under the bed. He hurries to the door and opens it, an easy smile on his face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lieutenant, what a surprise! What can I do for you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . KELLAWAY You can answer a few questions.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've got to get ready for work.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . KELLAWAY Trust me. Your bank's opening late today. Kellaway steps into the apartment, without waiting for an invitation. Stanley glances nervously back at the closet. Milo is scratching at the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . KELLAWAY (CONT.) Where were you last night?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Here... mostly. Is something wrong?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . KELLAWAY Maybe, yes. Maybe, no. Maybe it's all just a crazy coincidence that this so called "Mask" character always seems to be wherever you are.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mask -- who?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . KELLAWAY Don't insult my intelligence, Ipkiss. First, he's spotted in your building, then the bank where you work and now I find this at the Monkey's Paw. He displays the TORN PIECE OF FABRIC. It matches the piece missing in Stanley's pajamas. Stanley wilts. Milo YAPS and leaps up, trying to open the closet door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Milo. No! (moves the dog away) Okay, so I went out on the town last night. A guy's got to have a little fun.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . KELLAWAY In your jammies? Milo is back at the closet door. He's just about got it open as Stanley turns the detective to the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Naw, I just took 'em with me in case I didn't make it home. I don't know about you, Lieutenant. But I've got a pretty good track record with the ladies. Kellaway pulls away from Stanley and begins suspiciously SNIFFING the air around him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . KELLAWAY Wait a second... you smell that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bullshit. I hate the smell of bullshit. Don't even think about leaving town, Ipkiss. I'll be in touch. Kellaway SLAMS the front door, just as the closet door falls open -- spilling all the cash. Milo happily snatches his Frisbee. Stanley sinks back down on his bed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are we gonna do, Milo? What are we gonna do? C.U. - VIDEO MONITOR A replay of the bank robbery, from the bank's grainy videocams. A blurred image of the Mask is visible as he zig-zags around the bank at high speed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: R Kellaway sips a cup of brackish coffee as Oliveras FREEZE-FRAMES the best image of the Mask. There's a wild-eyed look of glee on his face as he stuffs sacks full of money.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know, boss. That's one helluva rubber mask.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . KELLAWAY Where's the lab report? Oliveras hands it over.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We got fingerprints on some of the currency, but nothing matches Tyrel's men. Looks like this guy beat 'em to the punch.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . KELLAWAY Get the bank's employee files and run down the prints on a guy named Ipkiss.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You figure it was an inside job?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . KELLAWAY Yeah, and all I need is a couple of prints to lock this wack job up 'till doomsday.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dorian's assembled a war council. At the table are Sweet Eddy and assorted Button Men from the city's underworld. An open attache case filled with stacks of money sits before Dorian.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A fifty thousand dollar reward to the man who finds this "Mask" character before the cops do. Get the word out to every street hustler and low life in this town. (pounds his fist) I want him here. In my office. Alive. By tomorrow! Now get going! Everybody scrambles out of their seats. Tina sits in the corner of the room, painting her nails. She glances up at Dorian.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you looking at?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You. You're losing it Dorian.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm losing nothing. Except maybe some extra baggage I don't need around here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's that supposed to mean?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You weren't putting up much of a fight when that green goon kissed you last night.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: C'mon, did it look to you like I had a choice?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Maybe you did and maybe you didn't, but I know this, one day real soon I'm gonna run this town and when I do there's gonna be payback for anyone who crossed me. (glares at her) I mean anyone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The place is in general disarray but still functioning, jammed with worried depositors. Stanley makes his way to his desk, his face pale and unshaven. Dark circles ring his eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . DICKEY Ipkiss! We have a crisis on our hands here and you stroll in over an hour late. If I have to put up with your slovenly... Stanley develops an odd facial TWITCH, then...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Back off Monkey-Boy, before I tell your daddy how you're running this branch like it's your own personal piggy bank! If the I.R.S. saw some of those files we could arrange a little vacation for you at Club Fed! Dickey is absolutely shocked into silence by this outburst, then...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . DICKEY That will be all, Ipkiss. Dickey turns on his heels and exits. Charlie Schumacher now appears glowing with new respect for Stanley.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Woah! What side of who's bed did you wake up on?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm not sure. (TWITCHES) I haven't exactly been myself lately. For a split second, Stanley's entire face CONTORTS into an alarming Mask-like expression.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, well you look like you could use a little R and R there buddy... and as a matter of fact I've got just the ticket. Or should I say tickets?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm afraid to ask. Charlie flashes two tickets.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Saturday night. Grand opening of the Valhalla Casino. Serious skirt alert. Everybody who's anybody will be there. What do you say?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know Charlie, I... Stanley suddenly spots Tina making her way across the room to his desk.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (CONT.) Excuse me a second.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tina... What are you doing here?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I heard about the robbery. I guess I just wanted to make sure you were okay.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, don't worry about me. (TWITCHES) I'm fine.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you sure? You look a little...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm just having a little trouble sleeping is all. (BEAT) I guess you won't want to open that account after all this...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm not so sure I'll have much to open an account with anymore.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What about the nightclub? I thought you were doing great.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know how much longer I can stay there Stanley. Things are getting a little intense.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, there must be plenty of other places you could sing. Maybe even get a record deal...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I wish it was that easy. There's thousands of girls out there just like me who...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not just like you. You've got a voice like... like an angel.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (lights a cigarette) An angel huh? That's the first time I've heard that one.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, I mean it. You really do.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I can vamp my way through a tune. But that's not really singing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What is it with you, Tina? Why don't you believe in yourself?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I guess I've just heard a lot of promises from a lot of guys. In the end they all wanted the same thing and it wasn't a song.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So maybe you've been singing for the wrong guys.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm not so sure there's any other kind. Not for me, anyway. (RISES) Well, I'm glad nobody got hurt.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What about this guy, the Mask? Do the cops have a line on him?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm not sure. Why are you interested?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Promise you won't say anything?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sure.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He came to the club last night and he was just so... well, different. I haven't been able to get him off my mind.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Really? They say he's pretty weird looking.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah. He's ugly... but he's kinda cool... y'know, like Mick Jagger.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You really think so?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah. If you hear anything about him, would you call me at the club? Stanley nods - unsure of what to say. Tina opens the door, but before she exits...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Actually... I sort of know the guy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Mask. We're - old college buddies him and I.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you serious?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh yeah. To tell you the truth, I'm sorta covering for him on this bank thing. He's not such a bad guy, really. He just gets a little carried away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll say. Do you think you could give him a message?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I suppose so.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tell him I want to see him again
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: When? I mean, I'd need to tell him exactly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How about seven o'clock tonight at Peninsula Park.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll be... I mean, I'll make sure he's there.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Peggy parks her car in her space, locks it up and beeps on the car horn. When she turns, she notices a shadowy FIGURE watching her from a bark corner of the garage. She hurries down the row of parked cars, clutching her purse to her side. The figure follows at a slow but relentless pace. Peggy fumbles for her keys, finally finds the correct one and enters the building.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Peggy is relieved as she reaches her apartment door and slips the key in the lock... but the lock is jammed. She tries and tries again... nothing. Suddenly, a hand enters frame and SLAPS an eviction notice on her door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sorry, doll. I had the locks changed this afternoon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You what? You can't do that!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You've known we're going condo for six months, Peggy. I can't stall the owner a minute longer. Either you pony up the downpayment or you're out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just a couple more days, Phil. The paper's ready to give me a full time job.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've heard that one before.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: C'mon, at least let me get a few of my things. Phil considers this a beat, then unlocks the door for her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't make me regret this. We get a certified check by noon tomorrow or a Sheriff will escort you out of here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thanks Phil. You're a sweetheart. Phil exits. Peggy picks up her things when she hears an off- camera "Pssst." She turns.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: stands in the shadows by the fire escape. He's got a voice that sounds like he's been gargling glass.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I heard you were lookin' for a story.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who... Who are you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just a guy with a little information lookin' to make a buck. But maybe I heard wrong. You don't look like much of a reporter to me. Peggy gulps back her fear, determined to live up to her job.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You give me something worth printing and I'll get you your money. What's this about?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The guy they call the Mask and why Dorian Tyrel's willing to pay fifty large to get him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How do I find this Tyrel?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Careful, sweet meat. You break this story and he just might find you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : C.U. DORIAN as he enters...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dorian and Sweet Eddy casually step through the front door of the restaurant's ersatz chalet facade.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sweet Eddy takes a position by the door as Dorian greets Artie the Swede at a large oak table in the festeively decorated SMORGASBORD The Swede is flanked by his gunsels as he's served by a big blonde waitress in a classic peasant girl costume.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dorian... thanks for coming by, kid.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My pleasure, Swede. It's been too long. I was worried you were still pissed about that little thing with Harry the Hat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That? It was nothing. He was a pain in my ass anyway. Here, sit down, sit down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Congratulations on the new casino.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thanks, but it might be a little early to celebrate. As a matter of fact that's why I asked you to stop by.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is that right?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Here... have a little something to eat. That's Svenska meatballs, kid. The real thing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thanks. Dorian starts to eat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So, I tell you Dorian, it's a terrible shame. I put all my hard work into this beautiful casino and what do you think? All the sudden I got all kinda problems with the city. Big problems. The whole deal could fold.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Maybe I can help you out. I'm expecting to come into a little investment capital shortly. If worse comes to worse and you really need to bail out...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What a sweet guy. Isn't this guy a sweetheart? Thanks for the offer Dorian, but I think maybe I can solve this myself.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is that right?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's right. You know that Councilman you got in your pocket? Dorian freezes with a forkful of meatballs halfway to his mouth. He notices a PINK CARNATION squashed into the gravy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (CONT.) Well now you've got 'im in your mouth. How you like that? The Swede and his men have a good laugh as Dorian spits out his meatball. The Swede pulls a gun and jams it under Dorian's chin. Sweet Eddy goes for his gun, but one of the Swede's men pops up, jamming a barrel to his temple.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (CONT.) (to Dorian) Now listen close scumbag! You want to bw in business with me? Okay, we're partners now. I'm takin' fifty per cent off the Monkey's Paw. You screw with me again and I'll send you straight down to Hell with your scumbag councilman. You can apologize for eatin' him for lunch.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sure, Swede. Take it easy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good. Now get out of my sight. Dorian rises.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh Dorian, here's a couple tickets to my grand opening. Stop by. And try to dress up nice. It's good for business.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ON: NEWSPAPER HEADLINE "The Mask Robs Bank - Police Scour The City." It's accompanied by a grainy blow-up of the Mask from the bank video.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: jams a quarter in the slot, opens the machine and pulls out the entire stack of papers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: R to reveal Stanley, still looking pale and desperate as he dumps the entire stack of papers in a nearby garbage can. He starts to turn away when he notices an ad on the back of the paper for a book... "The Masks We Wear" by Dr. Arthur Neuman, the SAME man we saw interviewed on "The Larry King Show." The byline reads "The Mysterious Powers of the Identities Within Us." Stanley rips out the ad and hurries off down the street.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .U. - MASKS... Dozens of them line one wall. Tribal masks. Victorian masks. Ceramic masks. Masks from all countries and cultures.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: R Stanley paces the plush office like a caged animal while Dr. Neuman sits nearby toying with his pipe.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NEUMAN This is extremely unusual, Mr. Ipkiss. Barging in without an appointment or...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look, you're the big expert on masks, right? Well, I've got an emergency here! (his face TWITCHES)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NEUMAN Try to calm yourself. Now this woman you were telling me about, I'm not sure I understand the problem.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've got a date with the girl of my dreams, only she doesn't know it's me... Stanley suddenly reaches into his briefcase and pulls out the mask.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (CONT.) It's this thing!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NEUMAN (takes the mask) Very interesting... looks like tenth or eleventh century Scandinavian. Where did you get this?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (snatches it back) I found it... or it found me. I'm not sure. The problem is it's ruining my life!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NEUMAN So you believe this actually changes you into a different person?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes! (face twitches) It's turning me into some kind of lunatic! (briefly CONTORTS into a Mask expression)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NEUMAN Mr. Ipkiss, please. This is just obsessional dellusion. What you have here is nothing more than a piece of wood.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But your book says masks...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NEUMAN My book uses masks as a metaphor for our complex personalities. The masks we must present to the outside world... to suppress the id. To protect our innermost desires.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, well this one works in reverse.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NEUMAN You're going to have to be willing to work on this delusion or...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's not a delusion! Alright, I'll prove it to you if I have to, but I won't be responsible for the consequences.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NEUMAN Mr. Ipkiss please! There is no such thing as a magical mask.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (holds up mask) Last chance to hide all dangerous objects.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NEUMAN Alright then, go on. You're not going to frighten me. Stanley takes a deep breath and shoves the mask onto his face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whooooooooaaaaa... He starts spinning around.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NEUMAN Whoa, what? Stanley just stands there like an idiot. Nothing happened. He tries it again. Same result.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It didn't work?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NEUMAN Does that surprise you? The mask is nothing but a reflection of you - the inner you. Stanley isn't listening. He's thinking out load.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It worked last night. And the night before. Maybe it only works at night... What kind of mask did you say this was.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NEUMAN Scandinavian. It looks like a representation of Loki, the Norse God of Mischief. He supposedly caused so much trouble that Odin banished him from Valhalla forever.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What if he banished him... into a mask?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NEUMAN (SIGHS) I'm sorry, Mr. Ipkiss, we're out of time.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But what should I do about my date?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NEUMAN Your date?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know. Tonight. The park. Tina. Do I go as myself of the Mask? Dr. Neuman puts an arm around Stanley and leads him to the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NEUMAN Mr. Ipkiss, please. Haven't you been listening to anything I've been saying? Go as yourself. And as the Mask. (a beat) Because they are the one and the same, beautiful person Stanley sees this is a losing battle. He turns and walks out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lt. Kellaway sits in this unmarked police car, finishing up lunch. The police band comes on. Kellaway grabs it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . KELLAWAY Yeah?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) I've got that cross-check from the bank files.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . KELLAWAY And?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) It's Ipkiss, Alright. Stanley Ipkiss. Kellaway smiles to himself. At that moment -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: comes out of Dr. Neuman's office building. He gets in his car and drives off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) You want us to pick him up?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . KELLAWAY Don't do a thing until I tell you. Just keep the SWAT team standing by. If this guy's half as bad as he's supposed to be we'll need all the help we can get.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . KELLAWAY fires up his engine and pulls away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Topiaried ivy reads: "Welcome to Peninsula Park." A small sign below that reads: "No dumping." Carrying his briefcase, Stanley enters the park.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stanley passes through a stand of trees and nearly bumps into Tina.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stanley, what are you doing here?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, Tina... Hi. You're early.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A little.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I just... wanted to make sure you two got together okay.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's nice. (sits down) You know, I hardly ever stop by here. It's hard to believe it was just a garbage heap.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (looking at the sky) It's always beautiful at sunset. Those methane emissions really pick up the colors.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wow. They really do. All those pinks and greens.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well... I'm sure my cousin will be along any minute. He never shows up anywhere 'till after sundown. He's sort of strange that way. (RISES) I guess I'll get going.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, Stanley. Stay for a second. I was thinking about what you said and I, uh, I want you to know I appreciate it. Maybe you're right. If I believed in myself a little more I wouldn't rely on guys like Dorian.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dorian... You mean Dorian Tyrel?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah. He's sort of my manager.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tina, you've got to be careful of that guy. He's a dangerous criminal.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You really mean that, don't you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Absolutely. You ought to hear the stories...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, I mean, you're really worried about me. That's... real sweet, Stanley.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: C'mon, Tina this is serious. How involved are you with this guy?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I can take care of myself, Stanley. I always have.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, really? People close to Tyrel have a nasty habit of turning up dead, or haven't you noticed?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look, this may sound a little cold but I do what I have to do to get by, okay? I'm nobody in this town without Dorian.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And who are you with him Tina? I'm not exactly sure who I am anymore but at least I'm trying to find out. If you really had any faith in yourself, you wouldn't be hanging on to some kind of free ride. That last bit stung, and Stanley knows it. A shadow falls over them as the last rays of the sun disappear behind the clouds.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (CONT.) (SIGHS) I'm sorry Tina. I guess I better get going. Stanley gets up and hurries off through the trees.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stanley... wait! But he's already disappeared. Tina starts to follow after when she hears a strange WHOOOSH. A whirlwind begins to kick up the leaves all around her. The Mask leaps out from behind a stand of trees in all his glory and literally sweeps her off her feet. With his lower lip thrust out he romances Tina in a deep syrupy French voice.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cher! Ce moi! Je'taime, Je' taime, Je any old tame! At last we are together mon petite bon bon!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kellaway, Doyle, and two other officers are watching from a distance. He speaks into his walkie talkie in hushed tones.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is Kellaway. I need back up and I need it now! Every available man down to Peninsula Park.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: an old timer newshound hurries into the room, grabs his notebook and pulls on his coat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Looks like it's gonna be a long night. My wife is gonna kill me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What is it, Murray?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The cops got your pal Ipkiss staked out at Peninsula Park. We just picked it up over the police band.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let me cover it, Murray! You go on home to Claire.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know, Peggy. Ramsey said...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (grabs her coat) I'll take care of Ramsey. Thanks a million. I owe you one. She gives Murray a quick peck on the cheek and runs out the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Mask is all over Tina like a cheap suit, stroking her hair grabbing her bod. She's definitely having second thoughts about him as he backs her up to the bench.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Our love is like a red red rose, and I'm feeling so thorny already, I'd like to nip you in the bud! She ducks his grab, but he recovers smoothly, flipping out a pack of cigarettes. He pops one in her mouth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (CONT.) Cigarette? His hand is a blur of motion as he sticks dozens of cigarettes in her mouth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (CONT.) Regular? Menthol? Filter? Cigar? Cigarette? Tiparillo? He produces a huge blow torch from within his jacket and pops on the flame.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (CONT.) Let me get that for you! He grabs the gigantic wad of cigarettes as if they were one, puts them in his own mouth and applies the blow torch. With one mighty SSSUCK he smokes them all down to gray ash. Beat. The ash tumbles away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (CONT.) (exhales a huge cloud of smoke) Aaaaaah. And now... amore! He throws his arms wide and lunges at Tina.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Freeze! The Mask freezes in mid-air, arms outstretched and feet suspended off the ground.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (CONT.) Put your hands up! The Mask's lips barely move as he speaks in a tiny voice out the side of his mouth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But eu 'tol me 'oo freeze!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Alright, alright. Unfreeze! You're under arrest! The Mask instantly drops to the ground and throws himself into wildly exaggerated expressions of remorse and pain.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Under arrest! My god! The Law! I knew I'd forgotten something! (TEARS) I was so young! So foolish! So full of life! Tears are gushing from Stanley/Mask's eyes like twin water taps. He puts his hands out and Kellaway slaps on the cuffs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (CONT.) What... What'll they do with me, Sarge?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sorry, son. That's not my department. Search him! Doyle reaches into the Mask's zoot suit and starts tossing stuff on the ground.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Comb - Flintstones vitamins - Sousaphone - Bazooka - (PAUSE) picture of Kellaway's wife... Kellaway looks down at the photo. It really IS a picture of his wife with a handwritten note: "Call me, lover - 555-1234!"
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What the --? (PAUSE) Margaret! Furious, Kellaway LUNGES at Stanley/Mask's neck. Two other officers restrain him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You son of a bitch -- !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jeez, I figured you had a sense of humor! (PAUSE) After all, you married her! Stanley/Mask honks Kellaway's nose which makes a loud AHOOGA noise and runs for it. Kellaway starts to follow, but discovers he's now handcuffed to Doyle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get him! The other police officers draw their guns and give chase as Stanley RICOCHETS off through the trees hooting laughter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A twelve foot high stone wall surrounds the park. Stanley/Mask races through the entryway, SLAMMING the park's huge wooden gates behind him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: R - THE GATE The Mask throws an iron bolt, SNAPS on a huge padlock, SLAMS down a steel plate ZZZIPS up a gigantic zipper, HAMMERS in dozens of nails at high speed and throws himself against the gate panting... But then his eyes BUG OUT on stalks as he sees what lies on the opposite side of the gate.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: COPS... more COPS than seems humanly possible. They're in cars, armed antipersonnel carriers, hanging from trees, parachuting FROM helicopters... And they're all aiming serious looking guns at HIM.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's all over! Put your hands over your head or we'll open fire. Stanley/Mask looks around, like he's trying to figure a way out of this mess - then -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hit it! With that, a police SPOTLIGHT SNAPS on, and the brightly lit park entry-way becomes a beautifully lit stage. Stanley/Mask strikes a pose, now wearing a straw hat "boater" and weilding a cane. Pedestrians with radios and ghetto blasters look down in shock as a RUMBA begins playing from every speaker in town. Stanley/Mask SWAYS seductively in time to the music.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: steps forward, a look of surprise spreaading over her face as, against her will, she opens her mouth in song.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They rave about Sloppy Joe - the Latin lothario - but Havana - has a new sensation. It's "Cuban Pete RUMBA" by Desi Arnaz! (Yes, this is a real song!)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (CONT.) He's really a modest guy - although he's the hottest guy - in HavAAAAna - and here's what he has to saaaay - Stanley/Mask steps up to the "stage" and tilts the boater over his eyes, casting a sly glance toward the crowd.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ("Latin" voice) They call me Cuban Pete - I'm King of the Rumba beat - every time I play the maracas I go chick chick chickie boom! Gene Kelly on acid, Stanley/Mask punctuates his number with any number of sly gestures - winking, nodding, sliding seductively down a street lamp post, doing repeated "splits" on the sidewalk - it's his big number! The cops watch this with open mouthed astonishment.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kellaway climbs over two of his men to scale the wall. He can't believe his eyes. Doyle clamors up beside him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, he's not bad. Kellaway shoots him a dirty look.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: waltzes into the street, prancing just inches from the heavily armed cops. His legs twine around each other like spaghetti, then his upper torso SPINS until they're straightened out again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (still singing) Yessir, I'm Cuban Pete! The craze of my native street! When I start to dance everything goes chick chick chickie boom! Like some weird, loony case of mass hypnosis, Stanley/Mask waits for the "musical break" to coax the armed cops into JOINING him on the number - as the rough and tumble equivalent of CHORUS GIRLS!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The street takes the look of a Busby Berkeley musical as the cops HIGH STEP in time to the infectious RUMBA beat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kellaway leaps/tumbles down from the wall into some bushes and scrambles to his feet. He can't believe his eyes. His cops, his tac squad, his friggin' SWAT team - they're ALL in the street, dancing with this crazy maniac! Stanley/Mask sidles up to a heavily armed female SWAT officer, "dirty dancing" her across the street -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The senoritas they sing, and how they sling their sombreros --! (It's very nice! So full of
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ) (dip!) And when they're dancing they bring a happy ring to their vaqueros - they sing their song, all the day loonnnggg - Doyle crash lands beside Kellaway and starts out to join the others, but Kellaway grabs him by the back of his jacket.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You go out there and I'll blow your brains out! Furious, Kellaway yanks open the door of an abandoned squad car, pulls out a tear gas gun and fires into the air. The sharp REPORT AND stinging gas seems to break the spell of THE MASK. The music suddenly STOPS and the high stepping cops stagger away from the CHORUS line, looking confused.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . KELLAWAY (CONT.) Goddamn it! Arrest that thing! The cops - shaken back to reality - fumble for their weapons.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Mask takes off - dashing into the crowd.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: spots the Mask and races after him, calling his men.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (CONT.) This way!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: bumps into an OLD LADY who SCREAMS at his hideousness. The Mask realizes how obvious he is. He turns away and brings his arms to his head. There's a RIPPPING sound. And when he turns around, the Mask has now transformed back into...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Carrying the mask, Stanley tries to blend in with the crowd.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: followed by a handfull of officers bears down on him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Halt! Halt or we'll shoot! Stanley quickly cuts down...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stanley races down the lane - cops hot on his trail. Bullets EXPLODE all around him. Just as he reaches the next street...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: screeches to a halt - almost running Stanley over. The window rolls down revealing...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stanley! Get in! Stanley jumps into the passenger seat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Peggy rips around the bend, easily outdistancing the cops.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thanks. Where are we going?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Someplace where we'll be safe.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The streets are empty.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stanley and Peggy sit on stacks of bound newspapers in the vast shadowy shipping room. In the b.g., a huge machine spews out hundreds of newspapers on an assembly line. Everything's mechanized: printing, folding, wrapping. Peggy hands Stanley a cup of coffee. He's a complete wreck, clothes disheveled, rings under his eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I saw it. I saw the whole thing. What's happening to you, Stanley?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's crazy... I've lost all control. When I put on this mask I can do anything... be anything, but it's ruining my life.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stanley, I don't know what's happening to you, but I do know this. That letter you sent my column was from a guy with more guts and heart than any of the creeps I've met in Edge City. Whatever this mask is, you don't need it. You... Stanley Ipkiss, are already all you ever need to be.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gosh, Peggy. Do you really mean that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Actually... no.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What? We now hear a door open and footsteps.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What took you guys so long? I've been vamping here for twenty minutes. Dorian and three of his men stand there with their guns trained on Stanley.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is him?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You have the fifty thou? Sweet Eddy FLICKS open a briefcase lined with cash.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (CONT.) Right. When he puts on the mask he becomes that green thingamajig.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (still dumbfounded) Peggy, what are you doing?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sorry, Stanley. You really are a great guy, but I just can't lose my condo. You know how hard it is to find an apartment in this city. Sweet Eddy and a second thug grab Stanley and hang him over the steel maw of the whirring news press.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay Ipkiss. Where's the money from the heist?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My aparment. It's in my apartment!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thanks. Now I believe you have a pressing engagement.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, you said you wouldn't hurt him! Dorian toys with the wooden mask, enjoying his control over the situation.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're right. Easy boys. One thing at a time. Tell me about this mask, Ipkiss. How does it work?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know... You just put it on! The Mask FX theme builds, Dorian raises the mask to his face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Better be careful, boss. With a CRACK of thunder a whirlwind of light and power swirls around Dorian's figure. Unlike Stanley's transformation, Dorian's is much more diabolical. He grows and changes within a nimbus of ROARING light. Finally the light dies away and Dorian/Mask rises from a circle of swirling smoke. C.U. DORIAN/MASK While Stanley was a zoot suited bee-bopper in hyper-drive, Dorian/Mask is more like a hulking evil GENIE, fresh out of the lamp and pissed at the world. His diamond earring and touches of his neuvo-gangster look is still apparent, but his huge grin stretches out like a TYRANNOSAURUS Rex's under eyes that glow green with wicked power. His voice is a deep inhuman RUMBLE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What a rush.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whoa, boss... are you okay?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm better than ever, you idiot. Now stop the presses. There'll be a new headline tonight. Sweet Eddy stands there looking disappointed with Ipkiss still held dangling above the churning presses.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But what about him? Dorian/Mask wheels about and ROARS at Sweet Eddy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! I have other plans for Ipkiss. Everything's become so clear to me now! Peggy sheepishly reaches for the suitcase.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah... excuse me. If you don't mind, I'll just take my money and be going. You guys make yourselves at home. Dorian/Mask slides up to Peggy threateningly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Must you go? What a shame. You and I could make beautiful headlines together. Peggy removes his arm from her shoulder.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thanks, anyway. That wasn't part of the deal. Peggy snatches the briefcase, but Dorian/Mask blocks her exit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Of course. You only want what's coming to you, don't you? Peggy whips out a snub-nose .38 out from beneath her coat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Back off Freakazoid. I wasn't born yesterday.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah... But you might die today! Dorian throws the switch and the presses CHURN to life. In a flash he snatches Peggy off her feet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (CONT.) A girl like you deserves to have her face plastered all over page one. He tosses her into the grinding mill of steel and paper.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: as Peggy's feet disappear between the presses' huge rollers and continues down, down past the whirling gears and hydraulics to finally ENDFRAME on the chute where the newspapers roll out on a conveyor belt. Headlines in blood red ink now read: "Reporter Killed in Freak Accident" next to a picture of a slightly flattened-looking Peggy, her mouth open in a silent scream.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do we do with Ipkiss?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The police are looking for the Mask. We shall give them the Mask. And Eddy...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, Dorian?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get the boys ready. The Swedes' expecting us at the casino opening tomorrow night. We wouldn't want to disappoint him, would we? Dorian/Mask throws his head back and lets loose a deep BOOMING LAUGH. It's unnerving even to Eddy, but he laughs nervously in RESPONSE and elbows the other thugs to join in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The door is kicked open and two of Dorian's henchmen burst into the room. Milo leaps off the couch and scrables behind the curtains. They yank open the closet door and start scooping the cash into plastic garbage bags.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stanley lies in the back seat, gagged, bound hand and foot and half hidden under a blanket. A thug in the driver's seat pokes his .45 under Stanley's nose.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That money better be where you said it was, Ipkiss or you can Ipkiss your ass goodbye. He chuckles at his own little joke.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Milo peeks out from behind the curtain as the henchmen finish their job. He ducks behind the curtain and looks out the window.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: of the henchmen's car. Stanley can barely be seen peeking out the car window. The henchmen pushes him back down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: His ears perk up. The boss is in trouble! He checks back outside the curtain.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: finish up and start out the door carrying the trash bags. Milo races right by them, just out of sight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The henchmen hop in and start the engine. As the car peels out into traffic, Milo appears, valiantly racing along the sidewalk, DODGING pedestrians and cross-traffic to keep the car in sight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dejected, Lt. Kellaway heads up the steps with Sgt. Doyle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . KELLAWAY I still can't believe it. Hardened cops dancin' in the streets... and broadcast all over the ten o'clock news.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The SWAT team got an offer to open for Wayne Newton.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . KELLAWAY I'm history. The Captain's going to have my badge for breakfast. With a little pension on top.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: C'mon Lieutenant, it wasn't your fault. Something will turn up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . KELLAWAY Sure. Stanley Ipkiss is going to fall right into my lap... A car SCREECHES BY. The door flies open and a BODY comes tumbling out - knocking Kellaway down. He looks up at the body sitting in HIS lap -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . KELLAWAY ...Ipkiss!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I can explain everything...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't bother. Doyle pulls a GREEN RUBBER MASK out of Stanley's pocket. Kellaway starts hauling him up the precinct steps.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . KELLAWAY You have the right to remain silent, you freakin' Looney Tune. Anymore of your half-baked wisecracks can and will be used against you by me, personally...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You've got to listen to me! Kellaway and Doyle drag Stanley into the precinct - just as MILO charges up. But the dog is shut out of the station.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bruised, beaten and exhuasted - Stanley's thrown into a small cell. The KEY-GUARD locks the cell up - then walks away. Stanley looks around his dismal quarters. A filthy toilet. The cot even worse. There's a YOWLING. He climbs up on the cot and looks out the small, barred window.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : There's a dumpster below the window, overflowing with trash. Next to the trash heap - is MILO. The dog looks up at Stanley and YIPS happily. Stanley forces a smile.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Go find yourself a new home, Milo. It looks like I'm going to be here for a long long time... Milo watches Stanley recede back into the cell.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stanley lies on his cot - staring at the ceiling. The Guard bangs on the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wake up. You gotta visitor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: About time you found me a lawyer... (a beat) ...Tina?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hello, Stanley.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's wrong? Your boyfriend kick you out for not delivering me on schedule?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is that what you think - that I set you up?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know. But I've got plenty of time to figure it out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're just going to have to trust me on this.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now is not the best time for me on trusting women.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I ran out on Dorian last night, Stanley. I just came to tell you I'm sorry. Sorry about everything.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You ran out on him?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That magic mask of yours turned him into some kind of monster...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He wasn't exactly Mother Theresa in the first place.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's going to the casino opening tonight and he's planning to do something terrible.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A real change of pace for him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Half this town will be there Stanley. I tried to tell the cops, but they wouldn't listen to me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As long as he's got the mask, there's nothing they can do to stop him anyway. There's nothing anyone can do.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There must be some way. How does it work?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's like it brings you innermost desires to life. If deep down inside you're a little repressed and... a hopeless romantic, you become sort of a love-crazy wild man.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And if you've got a black heart?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then the world's going to be a very dark place. And if I were you, I'd get out of town. Fast. Tina takes a beat and absorbs this information.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thanks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: For what?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lots of things. For really believing in me when I couldn't. For sharing a sunset with me. For being the first guy to treat me like I was a person instead of a slab of meat. (a beat) And for being any kind of romantic. Even a hopeless one.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're welcome.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know, that night at the club I knew I met someone special. Someone like nobody I'd ever met before.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Mask.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No... the guy that was inside the Mask all the time. You. Stanley Ip - They draw closer. The iron bars scrunch up their faces...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (CONT.) --kiss. They KISS. A sweet, soft and romantic kiss. Then... the KEY-GUARD pulls her away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Time's up, lady.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've got to disappear for awhile Stanley. I'm not sure where I'll go but I'll let you know as soon as I can. Stanley takes a long last look at Tina as she's escorted out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Warily, Tina slips out of the precinct. She's about to cross the street, but spots a SUSPICIOUS LIMO, engine idling. Quickly, she doubles back and heads -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Behind the station. She looks over her shoulder. No one's there. Tina hurries toward the next street and -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: roars up, cutting her off. She turns and runs back the way she came - but freezes when THE LIMO screeches up, blocking her. Sweet Eddy and Hicks jump out of the limo. She SCREAMS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stanley watches helplessly as Tina is dragged into the limo. Frantic, Stanley runs to the cell door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to the Key-Guard) Hey! A girl's being kidnapped out there! Do something!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: tunrs up the volume on JEOPARDY, drowning Stanley out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A slick/modern house on the hills overlooking Edge City. Sweet Eddy pulls Tina from the limo.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sweet Eddy and Huey enter and push Tina roughly into the room. Dorian rises to meet her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Baby, there you are... (he embraces her) I was gettin' all worried about you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I just went out for a little while Dorian. Sweet Eddy holds up a small suitcase and an overstuffed shoulder bag he got from her car.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Looks like maybe a long little while, right baby? Dorian grabs her by the throat and SLAMS her against the wall. The pictures rattle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know what happened to the last bitch that ran out on me? Do you?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nobody else does either. Nobody ever will. He tosses her onto the bed. She lies there gasping for breath.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now fix yourself up, baby. And pick out something pretty to wear tonight. Dorian picks up the mask and admires it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (CONT.) We're going to make a big splash at that opening. One this town will never forget.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Agitated, Stanley paces around the room. Stanley's eyes pop open. An IDEA! He stands up, clunking his heaad on the upper bunk. STANLEY peers down the hall and sees
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: watching a TV boxing match. He's CHEWING on the leather key-chain strap. There's a half eaten sausage and a wedge of cheese on the desk.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: climbs up on the cot and looks out the window.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (stage whisper) Milo!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just a pile of trash. The dog's gone. Then... a RUSTLE. A filthy blanket moves... and MILO emerges from it - tail waggling as he sees Stanley. The little dog jumps up, helplessly trying to reach the window.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on, boy! Milo gets an idea. He jumps on boxes and trash bags, using them as steps. He climbs higher and higher until he's reached the top of the dumpster.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (CONT.) Come on, Milo! Milo jumps from the dumpster. He almost reaches the window, but falls back down again into the trash heap. The dog leaps a second time. On this jump, Stanley grabs him and brings him through the bars.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stanley gathers Milo up in his arms. The dog licks his face and YELPS joyously. Stanley muzzles him and peeks -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Key-Guard's SNORING in his chair. The chewed leather key- chain strap is still in his MOUTH. His half-eaten sausage and cheese still lies before him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: shows Milo the guard, then whispers in the dog's ear.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Keys, Milo. Get the keys! Milo cocks his head at the sound of the word KEYS. He zips out through the bars.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Milo trots down the hall and approaches the key-guard's station. The dog stares and sniffs at the SNORING man.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Milo returns, slipping back into the cell.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good boy... He pulls the wedge of cheese out of the dog's mouth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (CONT.) I said "keys" not "cheese"! Keys.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... keys! Stanley pushes the dog back out the cell.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He approaches the guard and stops - staring at the keys dangling from the man's mouth. Milo jumps up on the desk and bites down on THE key-chain. He starts to pull when... The guard stirs and almost wakes up. Milo freezes. A moment later, the guard starts SNORING again. Milo grabs the keys and trots back to Stanley's cell.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Atta boy, Milo. Now let's see if we can get out of here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Built on pilings at the edge of the marina, the extravagant Vegas-like structure looks like a stylized Viking castle. (Production note: Key mater shots will be matte paintings.)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: and tuxedoed GUESTS crowd around as the Swede and town DIGNITARIES prepare to cut a huge red ribbon and officially open the casino. Two statuesque BLONDES in scanty Valkyrie (Viking goddess) costumes present the Swede with a gigantic pair of SCISSORS. The CROWD applaudes and flashbulbs POP.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So, ladies and gentlemen with a special thanks to Mayor Tilton and everyone else who made this possible, I give you... the Valhalla Casino. With a mighty SNAP of the scissors the Swede cuts the ribbon and the doors of the casino open wide.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dorian's limo barrels through the streets of Edge City followed by two sedans full of his men. C.U. - THE SUN as it disappears behind the clouds. CAMERA PULLS BACK as the limo's moon roof slides shut. We tilt down to discover Dorian and Tina, dressed to the nines for the opening. Dorian holds the mask in his lap.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's almost time. Tina nervously starts to light a cigarette. Dorian snatches the lighter away from her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (CONT.) I wouldn't do that, Sweetie. We don't want to start the celebration early. Dorian flips back a blanket covering four compact wooden crates marked "C-7 - Caution U.S.M.C. Demolition Materials."
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (CONT.) Now sit back and try to relax. I've got to change for the party. Dorian slowly raises the mask to his face as Tina watches in horror.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The tinted glass LIGHTS UP from inside like muted fireworks as Dorian's transformation begins.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .U. - SLEEPING GUARD CAMERA PANS from his snoring mouth down to his gun as a hand carefully lifts it out of his holster.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: R Gun in hand, Stanley silently backs away with Milo at his side. The Guard chokes off a snore and begins to wake up. He sees Stanley's cell door standing open and goes for his gun... but grasps air.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: puts one hand over his eyes and slams the butt of the gun down as hard as he can on the Guard's head. THONK. The Guard drops back DOWN on his chair unconscious. Stanley peeks from beneath his hand and regards his work. Not bad. Milo yips happily.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on. Stanley turns and starts for the door when he bumps straight into Lt. Kellaway.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ipkiss! Stanley is shocked, but quickly realizes he's got the gun. He points it at Kellaway with greater authority.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hold it! I warn you! I'm seriously stressed out here!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Easy, Ipkiss. Don't be an idiot. You're in the middle of a police station. There's no way you're just going to walk out of here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're right. Stanley pockets Kellaway's gun while keeping him covered with the Guard's gun. He pulls the handcuffs from Kellaway's belt and begins to handcuff the two of them together.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now what are you doing?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Putting myself in your custody.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You are certifiable. Stanley unbuttons his shirt and holds it open.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Milo! Milo immediately jumps inside and Stanley buttons up. He now looks like he has a pretty nasty pot belly, but otherwise okay.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (CONT.) Okay. Now we have to hurry or we'll miss the party.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Of course. We wouldn't want to keep Alice and the white rabbit waiting. Keeping the gun jammed in Kellaway's ribs, Stanley folds his jacket over his gun hand. We hear it cock beneath the jacket. KA- LATCH.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now move.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The opening is in full swing as the limo and two sedans pull up to the front doors.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: R - LIMO as the CAR HOP attempts to open the passenger door, it EXPLODES off and shoots ten feet from the car taking the unfortunate Car Hop with it. Dorian/Mask steps out of swirling mists within the limo in all his wicked green glory.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't be shy, Tina. I know how you like to make an entrance. He pulls her out of the limo.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And I must say, that's a dress to die for. Or should I say in? Dorian's men scramble, hauling the C-7 out of the limo and racing off into the darkness with their automatic weapons.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lt. Kellaway and Stanley march past POLICEMEN, FELONS and CITIZENS in the front desk area looking stiff and unnatural as hell. Doyle waves hello from the coffee service as he munches on a chocolate doughnut.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hi Lieutenant. Where are you taking Ipkiss?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ixnay! Ehay's otgay an ungay... ouch! Stanley jams him in the ribs with that hidden gun.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What did you say? Milo pokes his head up out of Stanley's shirt, but Stanley instantly pushes it back down. Doyle does a double-take wondering what's wrong with this picture as they continue their stiff-legged walk out the door. Doyle gives an uncertain wave with his half-eaten doughnut.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (CONT.) ...See ya.
