direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . The casino is a true Caesar's Palace style show place featuring a dragon-prowed Viking ship that's the CENTERPIECE of the room. The gaming floor is packed with happy PARTY GOERS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: on Charlie Schumacher as he snatches a drink off a passing WAITRESS' tray and turns to a gorgeous Valkyrie change girl whose helmet has two large horns sticking out of it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hello tall, Nordic and beautiful. One look at you and I know how your hat feels. Suddenly Mrs. Peenman appears, pushing her way past Charlie with a paper bag filled with quarters.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . PEENMAN Out of my way, Buster. Mama feels lucky tonight. She jams a quarter in a slot machine right behind Charlie and throws her weight behind the handle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: as they suddenly EXPLODE inward, blowing Security Man off their feet. Dorian/Mask steps through the smoking ruin dragging Tina after him. He's flanked by a half dozen of his heavily armed men.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now... let the games begin! Armed Security pull their weapons, but are immediately blown away by the thugs. The crowd is thrown into a panic.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As it tears through the streets of Edge City with its siren BLARING. Kellaway sits in the rear of the car with his hands cuffed behind his back. Stanley's at the wheel with Milo at his side. Kellaway is livid.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ipkiss, I'll have you locked up for this so long sex will be safe again! Kellaway is thrown into the door as Stanley SCREECHES around a corner.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The frightened crowd mills about in terror as Dorian's thugs seal off the exits. They frisk down their captives for loot and jewelry. Orlando runs up to Dorian/Mask with canvas sacks filled with money.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We scored over half a mil from the safe!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: now pops out from behind a mock-stone pillar and opens fire on Dorian. BLAM. BLAM. BLAM. Orlando dives for cover. The bullets seem to have no effect as Dorian rips a Viking spear off a wall display and hurls it straight across the room with supernatural force. The spear SKEWERS the Security Guard, sends him flying back and PINS him to a slot machine which immediately rings TILT and spills out quarters.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You can come out now, Orlando. I think he got the point. Dorian hauls Tina over to the Vikin ship where his men are wiring up boxes of C-7 and sticks of dynamite. He slams her up against the prow as his men lash her in place with coils of rope.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let me go you bastard!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's wrong darling? This is your big production number. You of all people know how important it is to go out with a bang. Dorian pulls his walkie talkie out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (CONT.) Eddy... How goes it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sweet Eddy and two other Thugs are busy wiring explosives to the pillars that support the pier the casino rests on.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All set boss.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dorian plugs the timer into the nexus of all the wiring.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Excellent. The real party starts now and ends in... (sets timer) Thirty minutes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stanley SCREECHES to a halt in the cop car.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He turns to Kellaway, brandishing his gun.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay. When I push the red button the safety is off, right?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm not helping you, Ipkiss.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Alright, suit yourself. (to Milo) You stay and be a good boy. As soon as Stanley shuts the door Milo starts pawing at the handle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Swede scrambles under a crap table to escape the mayhem and bumps into Mayor Tilton.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ON Hey, watch it! Oh, Arnie... Suddenly the entire table is lifted away as if it were a child's toy and they look up into the evil grinning of Dorian/Mask.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Swede... my dear, dear business partner. And Mayor Tilton! What a surprise. We have just enough time left to play my favorite game!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As Stanley sneaks in an employee's door, the coast looks clear. He snaps off the kitchen lights. Stanley spots a THUG standing guard outside the kitchen's double doors. He ducks back down behind a barrel and gets an idea. The label on the barrel reads "Olive Oil".
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Thug seems to be enjoying the mayhem when he hears an off camera WHISTLE. He pulls out his .45 and cautiously enters the kitchen to investigate.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Thug enters, brandishing his gun and cautiously makes his way into the kitchen. C.U. - FOOT He steps into a large slick of olive oil and his legs shoot right out from under him. SLAM.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: as he slides across the kitchen floor at high speed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whoaaaaa! Suddenly Stanley pops up from behind the overturned barrel with a huge frying pan and slams it right into camera. CLANG.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: plucks the gun from the unconscious Guard and sneaks into the casino.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stanley appears out of the kitchen doors and gets the attention of the nearest captive party-goers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pssst. You guys. Over here. Charlie turns around.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stanley! What are you doing here? He motions them over to the kitchen and hands Charlie the gun.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Start sneaking people out the back. Watch out for the oil. Stanley now makes his way deeper into the casino.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Milo finally manages to pop the lock and the car door opens. He scurries off towards the casino.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Swede struggles desperately as he's tied to a spoke of a huge wooden NUMBERS WHEEL, a kind of upright roulette wheel that's one OF the casino's attractions. Mayor Tilton and two other town dignitaries are tied to the other three spokes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let me offa this thing, you lousy scumbag! Dorian/Mask pulls three Viking hand axes off a wall display and casually begins to juggle them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sorry Swede. I've got an ax to grind with you. In fact I got a couple and I'm afraid they may give you a splitting headache! He nods to one of his men who gives the wheel a big spin. As the captives SCREAM Dorian prepares to throw his first ax.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (CONT.) Round and round she goes. Who dies first, nobody knows!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stanley pops up behind the dragon-prow and starts untying Tina.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stanley!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hang on, Tina.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stanley, look out! Stanley ducks just as a Viking ax splits the dragonhead right next to him in half. Dorian ROARS with rage as he rushes across the room to the boat. Stanley pops back up firing his gun. BLAM. BLAM. BLAM. Dorian takes the direct hits. He grins horridly at Stanley and he extends his slimy tongue. C.U. - TONGUE The bullets all stand there on end in a neat little semi-circle. Dorian now sucks in a mighty breath. Stanley grabs a Viking shield and protects Tina and himself. Dorian blows the bullets back at Stanley.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . They batter the shield. Stanley's knocked backwards from the impact.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: drags Stanley out and SLAMS up against the prow next to Tina. One of his men immediately begins tying Stanley in place.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How touching! The two love birds. Just to show you there's no hard feelings, I'm going to let you spend the rest of your lives together.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You've got it all wrong! I could care less about this creep. Nobody could replace you, Dorian. Nobody!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If you think a line like that's going to save your life, you're dumber than he is.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay. Maybe it's too late. Then all I want is... a kiss.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A kiss?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: One last kiss.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (a beat) Sure, why not... Dorian/Mask sticks out his slimy TWO-FOOT TONGUE, and stick his eyebrows back. Hiss massive lips flutter as he puckers up. But Tina turns her head way.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No! From the real Dorian. The guy I used to love. (BREATHY) Nobody ever kissed me like Dorian Tyrel.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No time, boss. This building's going down any minute...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I make the decisions! And I've decided... Tina stares at him dreamily. Ego gets the better of him. He reaches up and RIPS the mask off. SSSSHUPP!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...to give the girl one last thrill. He plants his mouth on Tina's -- kissing her roughly. Tina really gets into it. But Stanley watches as Tina slyly positions the leg that he freed up. And...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: right out of Dorian's hand. It flies into the air.

direction.raw_text: S AS...

direction.raw_text: and SWEET EDDY ON THE RUN...

direction.raw_text: ... FINGERTIPS GRAZE IT... But then suddenly... shockingly...

direction.raw_text: soar straight up through thr human hands and...

direction.raw_text: as though it were a Frisbee. Everyone's stunned.

direction.raw_text: C'mere, you ugly little mutt...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: legs pumping frantically, is losing ground. At the last second, he drops the mask and jams his muzzle into it. Lightning FLASHES.

direction.raw_text: eyes widen as
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! His pint-sized doggy body now has a giant-sized GREEN HEAD with a double-row of JAGGED CANINE TEETH. The plain collar now sparkles with GLEAMING STUDS. RAZOR-TOENAILS distend. The eyes glow hell fire green.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (CONT.) Whoa! Reflexively, Dorian lets go. Dog/Mask unleashes an incredibly loud SONIC WOOF that explodes glass front slot machines all around them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (CONT.) Don't let it get away! Sweet Eddy lunges at the Dog/Mask. But the canine-creature runs between his legs and CHOMPS DOWN on his butt. The tiny dog picks BIG Sweet Eddy up and shakes him back and forth, like a rag doll.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: watches this, then takes a look at the TICKING DETONATOR. Less than a minute to go. He strains at his bonds -- forcing the rope into a FLAMING VIKING WALL TORCH. Tina winces as Stanley's hand-rope begins to burn.

direction.raw_text: uses Eddy as a club -- knocking other Thugs down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get him off me! Dorian raises his Uzi and SPRAYS THE AREA WITH GUNFIRE! Dog/Mask leaps away in the nick of time.

direction.raw_text: C'mon! We've got the money. Let's get the hell out of here!

direction.raw_text: I gotta have that mask! Dorian chases Dog/Mask into the maze of slot machines.

direction.raw_text: burns through his ropes. He frees himself and races to the detonator. 15 - 14 - 13 - 12 IN THE MAZE OF SLOT MACHINES Dorian stalks Dog/Mask, whistling for him to come. A stream of WATER now trickles down on him from above. Dog/Mask is in the chandelier taking a whiz and snorting doggie laughter. Dorian sprays the ceiling with gunfire, but...

direction.raw_text: pounces on Dorian, knocking him flat, then races out of sight.

direction.raw_text: Stanley yanks one wire after another, but the timer still ticks down -- 5 - 4 - 3 - 2 -- Stanley pulls the last wire. The timer stops. Tina exhales, relieved, as Stanley unties her.

direction.raw_text: (kissing him) You did it... C.U. - TIMER as it TICKS back to life... 2 - 1 - 0! A muffled EXPLOSION rumbles from beneath the floorboards.

direction.raw_text: straight across the gaming floor towards the huge front doors.

direction.raw_text: as the boat slides right over him.

direction.raw_text: Hold it right there or you'll be looking for this on the bottom of the harbor. Dorian stops in his tracks.

direction.raw_text: Drop it and I'll kill you all.

direction.raw_text: You can have it. But she gets to go.

direction.raw_text: Fine.

direction.raw_text: Go where?

direction.raw_text: Swimming. We're still close to shore.

direction.raw_text: Five seconds, Ipkiss. Stanley tosses a wooden barrel overboard and turns to Tina.

direction.raw_text: Go ahead. Hurry... Tina takes the dog and slips overboard. Dorian moves in.

direction.raw_text: Okay. Put it down. Right over there. Dorian waves his gun at the nearest dining table. Stanley starts to put down the mask. But at the last instant -- he tosses it

Dorian falls into one of the WALL TORCHES -- toppling it. The TWO MEN slug it out as a FIRE STARTS. It burns closer and closer to the dynamite -- the mask in the middle of the pile.

Dorian grabs him by the collar to retaliate but sees... The FIRE licking at the dynamite casing on which the mask lies. Dorian lunges for the mask. Stanley jumps overboard. The dynamite explodes!

direction.raw_text: Tina and Milo watch as the ship blows up. The fireball burns bright, smoke everywhere.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Stanley? Beat. Stanley surfaces gasping for breath. Tina pulls him over to the barrel and Milo licks his face. And then the smoke parts revealing...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: standing on the remains of the boat. Like Wile E. Coyote, he's charred pitch black, with singed hair and clothes. But like a cartoon -- he just shakes off the soot and stands there in all his fearsome Dorian/Mask glory.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What a BLAST! This mask makes me a god! He picks up the last fizzing, but UNDETONATED STICK OF TNT and laughs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (CONT.) I'm immortal... He raises his arms and thunders to the heavens. At that moment -- the SUN peaks over the horizon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (CONT.) Do you hear? I'm immortal! The sun's rays hit the Mask. In an instant, he transforms back to regular Dorian. The mask pops off Dorian's face -- useless. Dorian stares dumbfounded at the TNT stick in his hand as it -- KA-BOOM! Dorian is blown to smithereens.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There are cops everywhere. Lt. Kellaway wraps Tina in a dry blanket. Stanley holds out his arms.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Back to jail, Lieutenant?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . KELLAWAY Ipkiss, I'd like to lock you up for the rest of my life. But the mayor and a hundred other witnesses say Dorian Tyrel's the bad guy and you're the good guy. So no jail. Just a downtown parade at noon. (RESIGNED) And I've got to be your escort. Stanley smiles and puts his arms around Tina. They head down the beach. The two young lovers and Milo walk past -- CHARLIE SCHUMACHER standing near the crowd of post-party VICTIMS being helped by the POLICE and MEDICAL PERSONNEL. He's still hitting on that STATUESQUE Valkyrie change girl.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So I deck this thug, grab his gun and tell Stanley, "Take cover, Buddy. I'll get these folks out sae and sound." Y'know we should go back to my place so I can tell you the rest of the story.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mrs. Peenman is walking along grumbling to herself when she notices the mask floating to shore with some of the wreckage from the boat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . PEENMAN Just look at this mess... She picks it up out of the surf and The Mask FX theme begins to pound in her head. Back to Charlie and his Valkyrie.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So what do you say, sweetheart? Let's you and me go back to my place and scramble some eggs. Suddenly Mrs. Peenman/Mask ZZZIPS up and sweeps Charlie off his feet. She's the most whacked-out Mask creature yet with a huge GREEN Witch Hazel face and Bride of Frankenstein hair.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . PEENMAN/MASK Hello short, dark and handsome! C'mere and give Momma a kissy-poo! She starts SMACKING her king-sized lips horribly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yah! Put me down! She jams a hand down the front of Charlie's pants.
direction.name: direction
